snippet: A State Senate committee voted Wednesday to ban collective bargaining with public employee unions, a change that would be felt in school districts and local governments.
lead_paragraph: A State Senate committee voted Wednesday to ban collective bargaining with public employee unions, a change that would be felt in school districts and local governments.

headline.main: Arizona: Panel Votes to Ban Collective Bargaining
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Panel Votes To Ban Collective Bargaining
